ygData.subject: RE: Pugius Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I think it spawns on the main floor, but I could be mistaken. Each time I saw it, it was hanging out on the main floor.  I do agree with the level...
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I think it spawns on the main floor, but I could be mistaken.
Each time I saw it, it was hanging out on the main floor. I do agree with
the level... It was conning blue to me at level 20 or 21, IIRC.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [mailto:birdman@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 15, 1999 3:12 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Pugius Dagger
>
>
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
> It's found in Unrest, off the Lesser Blade Fiend (thus far,
> my favorite
> mob with regards to looks: picture a rock dervish with
> weapons instead of
> stones). The spawn is supposedly rare in itself, with the
> Gladius being
> the rare drop. I've heard rumor it comes from the basement,
> but it was
> blue to me somewhere in my high teens.
>
> Athren Notechaser
